enchantment.supplementaries.stasis.desc: Allows slingshot projectiles to ignore gravity, and generates Bubble Blocks if applied to a Bubble Blower.
enchantment.minecraft.loyalty.desc: Allows tridents and slingshot projectiles to automatically return after being thrown.
effect.farmersdelight.comfort.descriptio: Makes the player immune to Hunger, Slowness and Weakness.
effect.farmersdelight.nourishment.descri: Prevents the player from losing hunger and saturation through exhaustive actions (e.g running, jumping, attacking).
